item.description:
To avoid UFO confusion when you restart the project, always leave little reminders in your knitting as to where you are. In objects were gradual increases, such as sleeves and shawls or socks, you can slip a piece of waste yarn in the stitch to mark the increases. That way when you return you'll know where you left off.

This fiber fact and many more to come.

Also we have a knit night coming up.
item.name: Knit to it -Thursday March 12th
